extendedInfo.description: If you are still in school, and wondering how to test yourself on your science knowledge in a fun way, you have come to the right place!Hmm... Out of School long ago? Never mind, quiz yourself to know how much you remember !!Have kids? Take this quiz and let your kids follow. And tell us who won !!!A multi-choice science quiz on your iphone. What best way to use your iphone to have fun and knowledge at the same time!The areas of science we touch on include â¢ Physicsâ¢ Chemistryâ¢ Biologyâ¢ Zoologyâ¢ Earthâ¢ Inventions â¢ Space.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~MIXED TEST MODE:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~In mixed test questions are presented randomly from all the topics.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~DETAILED TEST RESULTS:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~A summary of the practice test is presented at the end of each test. It shows you the score, which questions you answered correctly and where you were wrong. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~PROGRESS METER:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~The app records your progress as you start giving practice tests.It shows you a beautiful bar chart so that you can track your weak areas and give more focus on them.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~FEATURE LIST:~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~â¢ Choose number of questions you would like in each test.â¢ Shows test results in HTML format.â¢ Track your progress.â¢ A new module, âProgress Meterâ keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topicâ¢ Special algorithm that randomizes questions every time you take a test.

reviews.title: Purely a testing tool
reviews.comment: I thought this app would have some component of learning but it is purely quiz based... learning by repetition. I thought it would be cool to introduce some new things to my son in fifth grade but the questions are fixed and there is not even an explanation offered for incorrect answers. It might be a great study tool for Kids\' Jeopardy, but useless for true learning.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Innaccurate and Unenlightening
reviews.comment: Many questions are grammatically wrong, others have ambiguous answers, and they are all random and lack any context. This app is a waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Real Challenge!!
reviews.comment: Fun & informative. My 12 year old son keeps telling me facts about science. Nice way to learn science... :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Science Challenge
reviews.comment: This is a great way to refresh ones knowledge and keep our selves prepared.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After all this time, and many updates, most of the questions are still irrelevent and many are poorly worded, miscatagorized or simply wrong. Uninstal
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pluto is no longer a planet!

reviews.comment: it had so many spelling errors in the biology one that just annoyed me. Uninstall.

reviews.comment: Needs more questions but other than that its really fun

reviews.comment: Beautiful.... Really neat app with beautiful interface and great science stuff. Well worth a $ for sure.
